title: Fregellae
description: Fregellae was a city of Latium Adjectum that became a Roman colony in 328 BC, but was subsequently captured by the Samnites; a Roman presence was re-established in 313 BC. Loyal to Rome during the Second Punic War, Fregellae revolted in 125 BC and the site was razed.

properties.title: Imagery location of centerpoint of Fregellae
